1.content: You are up at night in your house playing the new game splatoon 2 on your Nintendo switch. You are playing the salmon run mode. The screen then glows white and you are sucked into the game. When you wake up you see you are in salmon run. You then hear sloshing behind you. You turn around and see?
1.title: Time to splat

choices: A body part of the chum
A drop of water in the green water that is all around the stage
11.content: You then turn around and see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Chum_... coming strait at you. You then black out and when you regain conchisness you realize you can’t move. You then realize you have become a inanimate object. What inanimate object have you become?
11.title: A Chum

choices: A body part of the smallfry
12.content: You then see a tiny https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Small... coming at you with his little spoon. You try to dodge but he bonks you on the head and you black out. When you wake up you realize that you can’t move. You then realize you have become a inanimate object. But what inanimate object are you?
12.title: A Smallfry

choices: A body part of the cohock
A weapon used by the inklings or salmonids
A piece of food for a hungry salmonid
13.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Cohoc... coming at you with it’s huge frying pan in its hand. It try’s to wack you with it but you dodge. But somehow it lands another hit on you and you are nocked out. When you regain conchisness you realize you can’t move. You then realize you are now a inanimate object. But what inanimate object have you become?
13.title: A Cohock

choices: A body part of the snatcher
14.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Snatc... running tword you trying to get back the egg. It then slaps you so hard that you are nocked out. When you awaken you realize you can’t move. You then realize your now a inanimate object. But which inanimate object are you?
14.title: A Snatcher

141.content: You then realize your now a body part of the snatcher that nocked you out. But what body part of the snatcher are you?
141.title: A body part of the snatcher

choices: The mother of all the salmonids comes to the nest
A salmonid watches over the eggs
142.content: You realize you have been turned into a Golden salmonid egg https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/spla... the snatcher sees you and the egg you had in your hands and picks both of you up and makes a sprint for the water. It gets into the water and swims off with you. He then arrives a the salmonid nest. You see alought of salmonids swimming around. What happens next?
142.title: A Golden salmonid egg

15.content: What else could it be?
15.title: Other

choices: A body part of the Chinook
151.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Chino... in the sky flying with a box. It then gets shot down and nocks you out. You then wake up hours later and you can’t move. You then realize you are now a inanimate object. But what inanimate object are you?
151.title: A Chinook

152.content: What Boss Salmonid could it be?
152.title: Maybe it’s a Boss Salmonid

choices: A body part of the Steelhead
1521.content: You then see a giant https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Steel... behind you as it gets ready to fire off one of its ink bombs. It then fires it and it hits you and nocks you out. You then wake up and realize you can’t move. You then realize you are now a inanimate object. But what inanimate object are you?
1521.title: A Steelhead

15211.content: You realize you have become a body part of the steelhead. But what body part of it have you become?
15211.title: A body part of the Steelhead

choices: A body part of the Flyfish
1522.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Flyfi... locking on to you and firing missles at you. They then explode and nocks you out. When you wake you realize you can’t move. You then realize you have become a inanimate object. But what inanimate object have you become?
1522.title: A Flyfish

1523.content: What other boss salmonid could it be?
1523.title: Other

choices: A body part of the steel eel
15231.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:S2_Sa... steaming tword you. You then get run over by it. You wake up later. You realize you can’t move. You then realize your now a inanimate object. What inanimate object have you become though?
15231.title: A Steel Eel

choices: A body part of the maw
15232.content: You see a little lure appear below you and then a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Maw_U... appears out of the ink. You try to dodge but you get nocked out. You then wake up later but you can’t move. You realize you have become a inanimate object. But what inanimate object have you become?
15232.title: A Maw

15233.content: What else could it be?
15233.title: Other

choices: A body part of the stinger
A pan that makes up the tower
152331.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:S2_Sa... aiming at you as the huge blast of ink hits you it nocks you out. You then wake up later. You realize you can’t move. You then realize you have become a inanimate object. But what inanimate object have you become?
152331.title: A Stinger

choices: A body part of the drizzler
152332.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Drizz... aiming a rain storm bomb at you and it fires it and it nocks you out. You then wake up later. You realize you can’t move. You then realize your a inanimate object now. But what inanimate object are you?
152332.title: A Drizzler

152333.content: What else could it be?
152333.title: Other

choices: A body part of the scrapper
1523331.content: You then see a https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:Scrap... driving tword you it then hits you and your nocked out. You wake up later and you can’t move. You then realize that your now a inanimate object. But what inanimate object are you?
1523331.title: A Scrapper

1523332.content: What event salmonid is it?
1523332.title: Maybe it’s a event salmonid

152333232.content: Maybe you swap bodies with a salmonid instead?
152333232.title: Readers choice
